channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI closes the largest VC round of all time

item.title: Stealthy Malware Has Infected Thousands of Linux Systems for Years
item.description: Perfctl malware is hard to detect, persists after reboots, and can perform a breadth of malicious activities.

item.title: These 5 Automatic Cat Feeders Were the Best We Tested
item.description: We tested some of the most popular automatic dry and wet food pet feeders to see which ones are worth the money.
